title.narrative: Solomon Islands Disaster Prepapredness &#38;#38; Response Activities

description.narrative:
Formerly known as the 'Australia-Solomon Islands Disaster Preparedness &#38;#38; Response Partnership (2019-2022)'. This investment provides assistance to Solomon Islands to deliver humanitarian and disaster management support. This includes: Technical Assistance for Disaster Management to National Disaster Management Office e.g. UNOCHA humanitarian specialist; supporting public awareness messaging; replenishing NFIs stock following disaster responses; contributions to ADF HADR exercises in Solomon Islands; and for standby emergency response support and contingency budget. The total estimated value of this investment is $2.8 million over 4 years, starting in the 2018-19 financial year.
See 'notes' regarding design process.
